document.full_text: a drunken driver responsible for a 2009 crash that killed her best friend and seriously injured u.s. national team forward charlie davies has been sentenced to two years in prison.
document.title: driver in crash that injured davies gets 2 years
lines_and_colors: a drunken driver responsible for a 2009 crash that killed her best friend and seriously injured u.s. national team forward charlie davies has been sentenced to two years in prison.
